amendment.description: To require that amounts be made available to Directors of Veterans Integrated Service Networks to assess, evaluate, and improve the health care delivery by and business operations of medical centers of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3969 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3969 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2966-2969; text: CR S2967) To require that amounts be made available to Directors of Veterans Integrated Service Networks to assess, evaluate, and improve the health care delivery by and business operations of medical centers of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3969 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 3896.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3969 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
